```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(devtools)
library(plotrix)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)




datensatz <- readRDS("robo_pflege.rds")


ggplot(datensatz) +
 aes(x = gender, weight = kut) +
 geom_bar(fill = "#0c4c8a") +
 labs(x = " ", 
      y = " ", 
      title = " ", 
      subtitle = " ", 
      caption = " ") +
 theme_fivethirtyeight()





# Balkendiagramm (Jobtyp und robo_toilett)


ggplot(datensatz) +
 aes(x = job_type, weight = robo_toilett) +
 summarise(robo_toilett_m = mean(robo_toilett)-1, robo_toilett_sem = std.error(robo_toilett), Varianz = var(robo_toilett), SD = sd(robo_toilett)) %>% 
ggplot() +
  aes(x = job_type, weight = job_type_m, ymin = robo_toilett_m-robo_toilett_sem , ymax = robo_toilett_m+robo_toilett_sem, fill = job_type) +
 geom_bar(fill = "#fba29d") +
  geom_errorbar(width = 0.2) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,5)) +
 labs(x = "Jobtyp",
      y = "Anzahl der Zustimmungen",
      title = "Studierende haben eine höhere Akzeptanz gegenüber Roboter beim Toilettengang", 
      subtitle = "Balkendiagramm zu den Jobtypen") +
 theme_fivethirtyeight()



ggsave("GapinayaGaneshabalan/Diagramm_GaneshabalanStuhlmamnnKlein.pdf", width = 210, height = 297, units = "mm")
 
 

```
